page.title: 18HOW I SPEND MY SATURDAYS
page.content: I wake later than usual because there is no school. I help mum with the shopping in the morning, come home for dinner, then watch the afternoon film on television. At 5.30 I get a shower or bath ready to go out, and change into something smart. Sometimes I wear make-up dependning on what mood I'm in. I call for my friend and at 7.00 we go to the{Youth Club}where there are 3 rooms. The Snooker Room has both snooker and table tennis tables and a place to buy drinks and crisps. In the Hall we can play badminton, and in the Dark Room (very popular) we sit around listening to music. We pay 20 pence to get in the Youth Club which closes at 10.00 and we get the bus home. Children from 12 to 19 attend and if we behave ourselves we may have a disco. Anyone found swearing is banned for a week. Joanne Morris aged 14.
